sent.orig: Results Of 23 cases,there were 10 massive shape,3 node shape,6 liquefied necrosis,5 mixed shape.
sent.trans: 结果 23例中巨块型10例，结节型2例，坏死、液化型6例，混合型5例。

sent.orig: At higher overheating temperature, the shape of primary silicon becomes the star-shape and tree-shape.
sent.trans: 随着熔体过热温度的升高，凝固组织中初生硅形状由多边形向星形及树枝状转变。

sent.orig: Tank body adopts waist drum shape, olive shape or column shape.
sent.trans: 罐体采用腰鼓型、橄榄型或圆柱型布局。

sent.orig: The detection of shape of strip is a important segment strip quality detection and shape auto-control.
sent.trans: 板形检测是板带材质量检测和实现板形自动控制的重要环节。

sent.orig: Equivalent shape of diamond grain is set to calculate the shape and size of grains.
sent.trans: 选择晶形较规则的等积形金刚石磨粒作为实例，将金刚石磨粒的面积等效为正六边形。
